ygData.subject: Re: Why
ygData.msgSnippet: Run setup.exe in your gladiator directory, it will prompt you for which drive and directory Gladiator is in so it can load the appropriate files, image and
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 35
Message-ID: <17248.35.101.959279670@...>
Date: 29 May 1999 19:07:08 -0000
From: shayd@...
Subject: Re: Why


Run setup.exe in your gladiator directory, it
will prompt you for which drive and directory
Gladiator is in so it can load the appropriate
files, image and sound.  If that doesn't work,
you might try downloading the program again or
reinstalling it from the original ZIP.

-Shayd
